answers.answer: Dear Angel,Prominent cisterna magna can be due to many reasons.It may affect your memory.But other factors like diabetes, smoking can also contribute to the same.So its important to consult a neurologist,at the earliest, so that he can evaluate you and if required, ask you for further investigations.Regards.

question: Can you tell me what the significance of this is. I am suffering from headaches, fogginess, short term, memory loss and nurelga, Could this be the cause?
title: Prominent Cisterna Magna
